person.headline: AI Research and Product Management
person.summary:
I have fifteen years of experience in employing Computer Vision, Signal Processing and Machine Learning for client-centric, value-driven solutions. My experience includes founding a Machine Vision start-up,  being the VP-Engineering for a Sequoia funded startup in developing a SAS platform for Computer Vision  as well as ADAS and Medical Imaging . I am also enthusiastic about mentoring bright, young minds for adapting and envisaging innovative solutions in the field. 

My core competencies include  : 
Team Building and Development  
Technical Architecture
Computer Vision
Machine Learning/ Deep Learning 
Signal Processing
Edge Computing
Applied Mathematics

positionHistory.title: Director, Research
positionHistory.description:
We develop enterprise-grade manufacturing AI systems and edge-deployed AI stacks tailored for SMEs, enabling faster deployment of defect detection applications. Our solutions support knowledge digitization, digital twins, and visual inspection using multimodal transformers, self-supervised learning, and CNNs.
We work with imaging modalities such as X-ray, thermal, microwave, visible spectrum, and ultrasound.
Our technology is applied across industries including semiconductors, oil and gas, automotive, aerospace, shipbuilding, railways, and defense.

positionHistory.title: Head - New Product Development - Machine Vision
CTO
positionHistory.description:
A venture backed start-up working in edge based deep learning solutions for
• industrial inspection
• robotic perception
• video analytics
• activity recognition
• predictive control
Responsibilities
• Actively engage with customer , understand the usecases and develop solutions with our edge
framework
• Build and carry out product development vision
• Select and evaluate software architecture, SoC’s, ML frameworks and cloud frame works for
building an edge AI product
• Build a product team comprising ML engineers, embedded system engineers, cloud, UI and
application engineers
• Train the team on agile product development, ML fundamentals , applied mathematics and data
processing
• Released edge based beta product based on Nvidia SoC’s for industrial inspection, robotic percep-
tion and human activity recognition
• Work along with product owner in designing algorithms, model and validate the use cases and
map the same to yantraai propritery framework
• Supervise the deployment of product poc’s on the client floor
Achievements
•  IP’s
– An embedded deep learning software and hardware architecture for industrial inspection using
ARM SoC
– An embedded sotware and hardware architecture for human robot collabaration using camera
arrays
– An embedded software and hardware architecture for human action recognition using a monoc-
ular camera

positionHistory.title: Senior Engineer: ADAS
positionHistory.companyName: Tata Elxsi : Jaguar and Land Rover ODC
positionHistory.description: Research and Development of Computer Vision Algorithms for Driver Assistance Systems for Jaguar and Land Rover . Worked as a senior engineer in JLR Off Shore Development centre . As a part of the team helped in development of Lane departure warning , Pedestrian detection , 3D surround vision, Terrain mapping, Obstacle and object detection modules. Worked with Support vector machines , Neural networks , wavelets and sparse repersentations

positionHistory.title: Computer Vision Research Engineer
positionHistory.description:
Development of Image Processing algorithms which includes Medical Image denoising, 3D surface reconstruction. Developed a novel algorithm for the de-noising of ultrasound images using sparse representation. The image is represented as a sparse with respect to a overcomplete  dictionary.

Developed a multi view stereo pipe line for 3D scanner

company.name: Dhvani Analytic Intelligence
company.description: Dhvani AI focus is on NDE 4.0, which is a subset of Industry 4.0. We aim to provide software intelligence for data analysis and interpretation aspect of NDE tasks to enable industries to quickly comprehend highly complex data and make well informed data driven decisions. We have developed AI and ML powered solutions in radiology, ultrasonics, vision and MPI to assess industrial and structural components such as welds, aluminium castings, and shipbuilding structures.
